title: Readymade

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - As you roll this role, you get a random good role that could spawn in the current game and that the host deems to be "self-confirmable". You become that role, but you have Basic defense. At the start of Night 4, you also become Readymade, and you lose your other role's goal.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose up to four players each night. Redirect each of them to random players, then attack the first three and rampage attack the fourth.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 2207
*Your twisted love has stepped up to the plate.*
Roleblock and redirect immune
